phrases: I hope we can all be happy like this forever.
I knew I wore this for a reason!
Just what is the meaning of this?
On my way to school, I came across a girl drowning!
Why are you dressed like this?!
When I got back to shore, my whole outfit was missing!
They say she is fine now.
Sorry to bother you, Madoka, but can you come see me after school?
The club president really, really wants to see you there for some reason.
What, she wants to spar again?
The Sweats Club must be really busy.
Why do not you join, Michi?
Oh, hey, did not you wear your uniform today?
I kind of lost it on the way here.
But we are still in high school...
I... I cannot make up my mind about our future yet!
All right, let us change sets.
I mean, I love you in uniform too, but this...
I am glad I could join you.
We got some good practice in before the meet.
Now all you need to do is join the student council or the kendo club,
But I am already a club president.
Finally a recruit for the Sweats Club?
She is got guts, at least.
I have not seen you in half a year!
You are in high school now; dress properly.
Do you value the life you live here in Kamogawa?
Do you want to keep on living here forever?
If anything happens, call me right away.
Tokyo Marine University Marine Archaeology Labs
How long have you been there?!
I knew at a glance that we would get along great!
You even tracked me down just to return my uniform!
And that swimsuit of yours means you are ready to rescue people anytime!
It is my duty to wear it at all times when I am on a mission.
I thought you were a comrade, but maybe you are already a higher rank than me.
Two friends who tread forth with a singular determination!
People... do not really use it that much anymore...
But my big sister enjoys words like that, so I picked it up from her.
If run into any kind of trouble, I will help you out one hundred percent!
I am Fin e Ld si Laffinty.
You are not from around here, are you?
Now there is two of us!
There is one thing I have been having trouble with.
C'mon, let me help you out!
The star which shines a brighter blue than even Demetria.
You know what we have to do.
Be ready to sortie on a moment's notice.
Who died and left you in charge, Kirius?
Do you see the ghost of a planet too, Yurikano?
This was just sitting here offshore?
No, it had to sail here.
Hey, Dad, you seen Madoka around?
I thought I heard her come in a while back.
I will not let Madoka pilot a robot.
I thought it was going to be...
Enemy at 2 of the clock, range 7000 meters.
Long ago, you made a promise with this robot.
That someday, if necessary, you would unite your hearts as one.
The enemy believes that this robot holds immense power.
L'Egalite has sent me to protect both you and that robot.
Do not hold up until that butler gives the word.
All I can ride is a bike!
You just have to sit in the cockpit.
So you will be in trouble if I do not?
When did you arrive in Kamogawa?
So you have never seen all the wonderful things it has to offer?
I have got to do it!
She is in that robot that just took off!
She seems to be quite excited.
It is under remote control anyway.
Just tell her to keep a hold of herself, no matter what happens.
It is coming straight at us!
Is it trying to ram it?!
Here is where it gets fun.
Sorry guys, I messed up pretty badly!
If I could just pilot it myself...
It punched through a subspace field?!
You are not too shabby at kendo.
But let me show you how it is really done!
Lan, why do not we get something to eat?
We have got wonderful sushi too!
I want my wife's home cooking.
Whatever, I will just have my uncle fix something up.
